turns.content: https://hoovufresh.com/ prepare a questionnaire for founders of this website they got ₹1 cr for 2% Equity on shark tank

Hoovu Fresh is an Indian start-up that offers organic and natural food products to its customers. The company's website is visually appealing and user-friendly, with clear and concise information about their products and services. The homepage showcases a wide range of products that are available for purchase, including fruits,
https://hoovufresh.com/ - make questionaire for founders of this website

Sure, here are some questions that could be asked to the founders of Hoovu Fresh:

1. What inspired you to start Hoovu Fresh, and what challenges did you face in the initial stages of the company's development?
2. What differentiates Hoovu Fresh from other organic food delivery services in India, and how do you ensure the quality and freshness of your products?
3. How did you prepare for your appearance on Shark Tank India, and what was your experience like pitching your business to the investors?
4. Can you tell us more about the deal you made on Shark Tank India, including the terms and conditions and how it has impacted the growth of your business?
5. What are some of the biggest lessons you've learned as entrepreneurs since starting Hoovu Fresh, and what advice would you give to other aspiring founders in India's startup ecosystem?
6. What is your vision for the future of Hoovu Fresh, and how do you plan to scale your business while maintaining the same level of quality and customer satisfaction?
7. How do you engage with and receive feedback from your customers, and what role do their opinions play in shaping the direction of your company?
8. How do you approach sustainability and environmental responsibility in your business practices, and what steps have you taken to reduce your impact on the planet?
9. How do you see the organic food market evolving in India, and what opportunities do you see for Hoovu Fresh in this space?
10. What are some of the biggest challenges you anticipate facing as Hoovu Fresh grows, and how do you plan to address them?
funding from shark tank ₹1 cr for 2% Equity from Aman & Peyush make some question from this and add it overall questionair

Certainly! Here are some additional questions related to the funding received from Shark Tank India:

1. How did you decide on the valuation of Hoovu Fresh, and what factors did you take into consideration when negotiating with the investors?
2. How do you plan to utilize the funding received from Aman and Peyush, and what specific initiatives or projects do you have in mind for growth and expansion?
3. How has the funding from Shark Tank India impacted your business, and what new opportunities or challenges have arisen as a result?
4. What role do you see Aman and Peyush playing in the future of Hoovu Fresh, and how do you plan to leverage their expertise and network to further the success of the company?
5. How did you prepare for the due diligence process with the investors, and what documentation or information did you need to provide to secure the funding?
6. How do you balance the desire for growth and expansion with the need to maintain control and ownership of the company, especially given the equity stake sold to Aman and Peyush?
7. What advice would you give to other entrepreneurs looking to secure funding through Shark Tank India or other similar platforms?
8. How do you plan to measure the success and impact of the funding received from Shark Tank India, and what metrics or benchmarks will you use to track progress?
